jett.name: Jett

features.vehicle: small compact jet plane, red body with white accents, four yellow signal lights (two on cheeks, two on wing edges), stylized wing symbol on sides
features.robot: compact proportions, friendly expression, wings fold into backpack shape
features.unique: Four signal lights are the distinguishing feature, small sporty jet silhouette

jett.personality: enthusiastic, helpful, optimistic, energetic, problem-solver, brave
jett.abilities: fast delivery, quick thinking, leadership, calling other Super Wings for help

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, red jet plane, white accents, glossy enamel finish, toy-like CGI

jerome.name: Jerome
jerome.role_zh: 特技飛行員、表演者、舞蹈專家

features.vehicle: sleek blue war jet plane, yellow lightning bolt decorations on ailerons, pointed nose, green eyes, confident show plane posture
features.robot: slimmer agile silhouette, wings fold into clean back fin, performance-oriented poses
features.unique: Yellow lightning bolt decals on wings, stunt/show plane aesthetic

jerome.personality: experienced, wise, calm, mentor-like, stylish, confident, loves dancing
jerome.abilities: stunt flying, aerial performance, dancing, showing off style

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, blue jet plane, yellow lightning decorations, sleek war jet design

donnie.name: Donnie
donnie.role_zh: 工程師、發明家、建造專家

features.vehicle: Canadair-style airplane, big yellow hull with small wings, blue propellers and engine areas, bulky rounded body, work plane aesthetic
features.robot: stockier build than Jett, sturdy mechanic proportions, wider shoulders/torso, propellers visible on back/shoulders
features.unique: Bulky Canadair body shape, propeller plane, tool/construction theme

donnie.personality: builder, mechanical expert, practical, skilled, clumsy (stumbles often), inventive
donnie.abilities: building, repairing, inventing tools, construction work

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, yellow and blue airplane, Canadair style, construction equipment

chase.name: Chase

features.vehicle: dark blue spy airplane, three red thunder-shaped stripes on body, sleek spy plane design, angular features
features.robot: versatile transformation abilities, can transform into various vehicles beyond robot/plane modes
features.unique: Three distinctive red lightning stripes, spy theme, multiple transformation modes

chase.abilities: spy missions, versatile transformation (can become any vehicle), stealth, detective work

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, dark blue spy jet, three red lightning stripes

flip.name: Flip

features.vehicle: red sporty plane with white stripes, blue and yellow sports cap with symbol similar to Jett's, compact athletic design
features.robot: athletic proportions, leaner build than Donnie/Todd, wearing blue and yellow cap, energetic sports poses
features.unique: BLUE CAP WITH YELLOW TRIM - this is the key distinguishing feature from Jett (both are red), sports theme

flip.personality: energetic, competitive, sports-loving, enthusiastic, admires Jett, challenge-oriented
flip.abilities: sports challenges, acrobatic flying, athletic moves, turning situations into sports competitions

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, bright red transforming robot with distinctive blue cap, red body white stripes

flip.notes: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Flip is RED with white stripes and BLUE CAP, NOT green! The cap is the key feature that distinguishes him from Jett.

todd.name: Todd

features.vehicle: brown construction plane, yellow drill on nose, yellow hard hat on top, tank-like treads, sturdy build
features.robot: stocky proportions, hard hat always visible, drill nose prominent, construction worker aesthetic
features.unique: Drill nose and yellow hard hat, smaller green eyes (mole-like), tank treads, underground specialist

todd.personality: hard-working, determined, loves digging, straightforward, dependable
todd.abilities: digging, tunneling, underground work, pulling heavy objects, construction

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, brown plane, yellow drill nose, yellow hard hat, construction theme

paul.name: Paul

colors.accent: police markings, yellow sheriff stars, siren

features.vehicle: blue and white police plane, two lights on fore, siren on head, yellow sheriff stars on forearms, police vehicle colors and markings
features.robot: authoritative posture, police uniform aesthetic, sheriff stars visible on arms, professional demeanor
features.unique: Police markings, siren on head, sheriff stars, law enforcement theme

paul.personality: originally strict but fun-loving, loosened up over seasons, dancing expert (replaced Jerome), responsible, dutiful
paul.abilities: traffic control, detective work, law enforcement, security patrols, night guard duty

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, blue and white police plane, police markings, siren

bello.name: Bello
bello.role_zh: 動物專家、野生動物嚮導

features.vehicle: black and white striped safari plane (zebra pattern), propeller design, animal-themed decorations
features.robot: friendly appearance, animal pattern visible in robot mode, safari guide aesthetic
features.unique: Distinctive zebra-like black and white stripes, animal communication ability, safari theme

bello.personality: friendly, gentle, animal-loving, helpful, communicative, empathetic
bello.abilities: talking with animals in their language, animal care, safari guidance, wildlife expertise

training_data.captions: 3d animated character, black and white striped plane, zebra pattern, animal theme

visual_style.lighting: high-key daylight, soft shadows, bright reflections
visual_style.face_style: large expressive eyes integrated into windshield/front face
visual_style.proportions: rounded, safe, friendly; child-friendly toy aesthetic

transformation.mechanism: fuselage becomes torso, landing gear expands into legs, side panels deploy arms, wings fold into backpack

technical_info.negative_prompt_base: human, person, people, boy, girl, man, woman, child, humanoid, human face, multiple characters, extra eyes, wrong colors, blurry, low quality, 2d, anime style, photographic, cropped, watermark
